__u64 cc_round
 The round number against which this client is currently scheduling requests.
__u64 cc_sequence
 The sequence number used for requests scheduled by this client during the current round number.
atomic_t cc_ref
__u16 cc_quantum
 Round Robin quantum; the maximum number of RPCs the client is allowed to schedule in a single batch of each round.
__u16 cc_active
 # of pending requests for this client, on all existing rounds

Detailed Description

Object representing a client in CRR-N, as identified by its NID.
